Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 15 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 11 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Dragon makes 3 attacks, one with its Bite and two with its Claws
Other Actions.Action 2: Acid Breath, The Dragon exhales acid in a line.  Each creature caught in the line takes an Average 40 Acid damage
Other Actions.Action 3: Slowing Breath, The Dragon exhales gas in a cone.  Each creature caught in the area makes a Constitution saving throw, failing they can not use reactions, its speed is halved and it can not make more than one attack on its turn.  The creature can use an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both
